articles.title: Millions of iPhone users have already been using RCS, they just don't know it - Android Authority
articles.description: Millions of Japanese iPhone users have been sending text messages over RCS for years now. Here's how they've been doing it.
articles.content:
• Millions of Japanese iPhone users have been sending text messages over RCS for years now.
  • This is thanks to the downloadable +Message app created by three major Japanese carriers.
